name: Your Train 2
description:
"Your Train 2" is a very simple brain game! Customers who love trains, customers who love games, everyone can enjoy it. No expertise required.
We have prepared a total of more than 50 railway lines in Japan and Taiwan!
(You can enjoy this game even if you haven't played the previous work, "Tokyo Densha" and "Your Train".)

・To everyone who will be a train dispatcher
Dear train dispatchers, let's transport customers by starting various trains, such as local trains and limited express trains.
In the previous work, commuter routes in urban areas were the main ones, but in this work, we have prepared many railway routes throughout Japan and Taiwan. In addition, some of the commuter routes that appeared in the previous work have been completely remade and reappeared.

- Goal of the game
Let's aim for high operating profits by receiving fares from customers waiting at the station!
The fare in this game is a bit different from both reality and its predecessor. The fares you charge will decrease over time.

income
Fixed fare - waiting time before boarding - boarding time to the right end of the screen = fare income

Customers at any station will receive a fixed fare, but the fare will be less due to the time it takes for the train to arrive at the station and the time it takes for the train to run to the right end of the screen.

cost
To depart a train, a "departure fee" will be charged according to the number of vehicles.
Example: 30 for a 2-car train, 35 for a 3-car train, 40 for a 4-car train

Operating profit is the difference between fare revenue and departure cost.
Let's quickly provide trains to customers who are waiting at the station and quickly carry them to the right edge of the screen.

In particular, the game features a large number of express trains and bullet trains. In addition to the fare for these trains, customers can also receive a "express fee". In pursuing operating profit, the method of operating the limited express is very important. Please play a lot and grab the tricks.


・Method of operation
Operation is very easy.
All you have to do is decide the number of train cars to depart and let the train depart at the best timing.

・Volume is plentiful
We have over 50 train lines for you!
In addition, rules that were not in the previous game will appear in the middle of the game, so please enjoy them.

・Railway to play
JR Hokkaido, JR East, JR Tokai, JR West, JR Shikoku, JR Kyushu
Tobu, Seibu, Keikyu, Keio, Kintetsu, Meitetsu, Odakyu, Nankai, Keisei, Taiwan Railway, Taiwan High Speed Rail
Hokuso Railway Izukyu

・New features in this game
In the Information Center, we have added a "Layout" function that allows you to change the layout of the buttons according to how you hold your smartphone. You can choose from three types: right-handed, left-handed, and how to hold the game console.

・Changes from the previous game
In the previous game, the timing to receive the fare was the moment the customer boarded the car, but in this game, it is when the customer is brought to the right edge of the screen.

In the previous work, the departure cost for limited express trains and bullet trains was slightly higher, but in this work, all trains are the same.

"The effect of some buttons has been changed." Also new rules are coming. Instructions are provided in-game.


・Capacity is about 130MB
The storage burden is also small. There is no heavy processing at all, so there is no problem with relatively old models.
One game takes less than 3 minutes, so you can enjoy it easily.

- No ads, no in-app purchases
No in-app purchases. No ads.
There is nothing to disturb the operation of the train. Please concentrate on the game.
You can also choose the difficulty level from "Difficult/Normal/Easy". Children can enjoy themselves with peace of mind.
Let's share the results of driving on Twitter etc.
